trans-unit.source: Provides a set of recommended default values during component creation.
trans-unit.target: 在组件创建过程中提供一的组建议的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The IComponentInitializer interface can be implemented by any designer, which is a component that also implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner>, which receives a recommended set of default values for the component it is designing.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过任何设计器中，它是还实现一个组件实现该 IComponentInitializer 接口<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner>，后者接收一套建议的默认值为正在设计的组件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner>

trans-unit.source: IComponentInitializer is queried during new component creation.
trans-unit.target: IComponentInitializer 查询在新的组件创建过程中。

trans-unit.source: Recommended default values for the component's properties are passed in as name/value pairs in a dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 作为字典中的名称/值对传递组件的属性的建议的默认值。

trans-unit.source: This design provides two customization points: the toolbox item itself can be replaced or changed to perform custom actions, or the designer for a component can be changed to provide a custom action.
trans-unit.target: 这种设计提供两个自定义点︰ 可以替换为工具箱项本身，或将其更改以执行自定义操作，也可以更改组件的设计器以提供自定义操作。

trans-unit.source: A designer that implements IComponentInitializer should not depend on either of its methods—<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentInitializer.InitializeNewComponent%2A> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentInitializer.InitializeExistingComponent%2A>—being called, because toolbox items are not obligated to call these methods.
trans-unit.target: 实现 IComponentInitializer 设计器不应依赖于其方法之一-<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentInitializer.InitializeNewComponent%2A>或<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentInitializer.InitializeExistingComponent%2A>-调用，因为工具箱项就不是调用这些方法的义务。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentInitializer.InitializeExistingComponent%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentInitializer.InitializeNewComponent%2A>

trans-unit.source: For an overview of creating design components, see [Extending Design-Time Support](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关创建设计组件的概述，请参阅[扩展设计时支持](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Restores an instance of a component to its default state.
trans-unit.target: 将组件的实例还原为其默认状态。

trans-unit.source: The InitializeExistingComponent method is called when a designer will re-initialize an existing component.
trans-unit.target: 在设计器将会重新初始化现有组件时调用 InitializeExistingComponent 方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, InitializeExistingComponent is commonly called after a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 例如，InitializeExistingComponent 通常称为拖放操作之后。

trans-unit.source: The `defaultValues` parameter is a dictionary containing name/value pairs of default values that should be applied to properties of the associated component.
trans-unit.target: `defaultValues`参数是一个包含应该应用到关联的组件的属性的默认值的名称/值对的字典。

trans-unit.source: This dictionary may be `null` if no default values have been specified.
trans-unit.target: 此字典可能`null`已指定的任何默认值。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > When implementing this method, generally you should not modify the component properties beyond those recommendations found in `defaultValue`.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 实现此方法时，通常不应修改的组件属性中找到这些建议超出`defaultValue`。

trans-unit.source: The existing component may already have had its properties set by the user or other design-time code.
trans-unit.target: 现有组件可能已经具有由用户或其他设计时代码中设置其属性。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of default property values, which are name/value pairs, with which to reset the component's state.
trans-unit.target: 是名称/值对，用来重置组件的状态的默认属性值的字典。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new component using a set of recommended values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新的组件使用的一组建议的值。

trans-unit.source: The InitializeNewComponent method is called after a new component is created.
trans-unit.target: 创建新的组件后调用 InitializeNewComponent 方法。

trans-unit.source: It is typically called by the toolbox item itself and is used to configure the component’s default values.
trans-unit.target: 它通常由工具箱项自身调用，用于配置组件的默认值。

trans-unit.source: This dictionary may be `null` if no default values are specified.
trans-unit.target: 此字典可能`null`如果不指定任何默认值。

trans-unit.source: If the dictionary is `null`, the component properties should be left in their implicit default states.
trans-unit.target: 如果字典是`null`，组件属性应保留为其隐式的默认状态。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of default property values, which are name/value pairs, with which to initialize the component's state.
trans-unit.target: 是名称/值对，用来初始化组件的状态的默认属性值的字典。
